name: LD47: Hullu Callu
description:
From the dark forest, beyond the hills, rises the Hullu Callu: the flaming skull seaking for death.

Before start the killingspree, it must pass throught the bloody obstacles.

The challenge is hard, but Hullu Kallu will not rest until start the killing.

Mechanics
  • A 2D action game.
  • Pass through the challenging obstacles controlling a Skull stuck in a loop of fire.
Characters
  • Hullu Callu:

__

Controls
  • WASD moves.

__

Programs used:
  • Unity
  • Adobe Photoshop
  • Adobe Illustrator
  • Adobe After Effects
  • Spotify

__

Notes
  • The fire graphics from the skull were the only graphics not made by us.
  • The audio weren’t made by us.
